nodes.text: The Jhanjaari River was a river located on the Core World Chandrila. The river, which flowed from Chandrila's Shashwaat Mountains to Lake Sah'ot and then to the sea, separated the western edge of the planet's capital of Hanna City from the Hanna Wild Game Reserve, a hunting reserve located near the capital.

The Jhanjaari River was pictured in the in the 2003 Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook Coruscant and the Core Worlds, which was published by Wizards of the Coast. It was first identified by name in the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying expansion Strongholds of Resistance, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
